short.en: Adds a dashboard for web resources

long.en:
Adds a dashboard for web resources. Resources can be scoped to specific Entities, Profiles, Groups, or Users (or a mix). Resources can have an image icon (favicon for example), or a FontAwesome icon like 'fab fa-github". Non-image icons can have their colors changed as you see fit.
Resources can be any weblink or a link with a special URI scheme. For example these links are all valid: - https://glpi-project.org (Standard URL) - market://details?id=org.glpi.inventory.agent&hl=en_US (Link to app on Android's Play Store) - softwarecenter://Page=AvailableSoftware (Link to the Available Software page in the SCCM/MEM Software Center) For more information about URI schemes please refer to https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_URI_schemes.
